attributes.action: Ban conversion therapy from private and public medical practices and hospitals.
attributes.additional_details: Conversion therapy still happens, and most of the time it goes by unnoticed by the press. LGBT is accepted by law in the UK; so therefore conversation therapy should be seen as homophobic and a hate crime.
attributes.background: LGBT+ is legal in the UK however conversion therapy is being banned by other countries but the UK has not. Conversion therapy should be seen as a hate crime towards the LGBT community.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Ensure the protection of transgender people under a conversion therapy ban:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640153
